availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Orrinda Henson Culp. Father of Sarah E. Culp, R. T. Culp, Mary C. Culp, Marcy A. Culp, and William G. Culp.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 108-109. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 3, p. 9. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965. Ancestry, Marriages, Marshall County, 1851.
